title: Tech sell-off pushes Nasdaq to steepest drop since June 2020 - CNBC
content:
1. Tech sell-off pushes Nasdaq to steepest drop since June 2020  CNBC
  2. Software Stocks Take the Harshest Blows in Brutal Tech Selloff  Bloomberg
  3. Media, Tech Stocks Slide; US Markets See Biggest Drop Since 2020  Variety
  4. Stocks Plunge As Interest Rates Rise; Tech, Showbiz Shares Pummeled, Outlier Twitter Posts Gains  Deadline
  5. Big Tech Hit by Multi-Billion Dollar Rout as Silicon Valley Recession Fears Grow  TheStreet
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: E-commerce and cloud stocks led the decline in technology, which was hit particularly hard after the Federal Reserve raised its benchmark interest rate.
